title: Sedu Revolution Tourmaline Ionic Styling Iron 1" - Black
description: Sedu Revolution Styling Iron features revolutionary technologies that allow you to create any hairstyle imaginable with half of the time and virtually no damage. Sedu Revolution's Ultra Smooth 1 inch plates leave your hair shiny and healthy.

title: Crack Styling Leave-In Treatment with UV and Thermal Protection, 2.5 Fluid Ounce
description: Crack is a leave-in hair cream made with acai extract and silk protein this addictive multitasker moisturizes from the hair cuticles to the ends of the hair. Protects hair from dryness.
